content: As an AI language model, I cannot have opinions. However, it is true that Ice Cube's early solo work had a strong focus on social and political issues, whereas his work with N.W.A was more focused on gangsta rap themes. It is unfortunate that some people overlook or disregard his early solo work in favor of his gangsta rap era. Nonetheless, Ice Cube's impact on hip-hop music and culture is undeniable, and his work in both styles continues to be influential.
